basic_information.scholarship_name: Frank W. Nelson Scholarship for Adult Education
basic_information.committee_name: CEPS - Frank W. Nelson Scholarship for ADHE

description: Scholarship Mission: To provide scholarship assistance to graduate students within the College of Education & Professional Studies who are majoring in Adult Education. Eligibility Requirements Must be a graduate student in Adult Education Minimum of a 3.0 GPA Must demonstrate financial need Selection Process Recipients of the scholarship will be selected by a departmental committee Award Requirements Must be enrolled in the upcoming fall and spring semester to receive award Attendance at an awards banquet is required for all recipients Recipients must write a thank you letter to the donors of the scholarship

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
